title: Executive Order 7618-Abolishing Vineyard Haven, Massachusetts, as a Customs Port of Entry
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by the act of August 1, 1914, 38 Stat. 609, 623 (US.C., title 19, sec. 2), it is ordered that Vineyard Haven, Massachusetts, be, and it is hereby, abolished as a customs port of entry in Customs Collection District No. 4 (Massachusetts), as a customs port of entry, effective immediately.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7618-Abolishing Vineyard Haven, Massachusetts, as a Customs Port of Entry Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/368977
